reviews.review_msg: Best prof I have ever had, and I've been to 3 different universities! Intelligent, funny, clever, and an absolute pleasure to have lecture!
Far too energetic - she makes me anxious

She's super nice and knows her stuff but she's too quiet!!! She also responds to emails right away! avoid sitting and the back and you'll be fine. If she talked a little louder i probably would've given her a 5 tbh

I think Cara is getting a pretty tough go here on RMP.  She isn't as bad as the ratings suggest. Political ethics could be much more interesting if there wasn't such an intense focus on the enviro perspective.  The powerpoints were weak and impossible to take notes from. TA could have had more direction. I found it interesting though.

She doesn't use any punctuation in her overheads so you can't understand any of the notes. She is boring and incoherent in her lectures. Completely unapproachable unless you wanna be accused of blackmail. Horrible horrible teacher.
Not helpful at all. Not approachable and reads the lecture off sheets of paper.
Freshly minted PhD - a very soft touch.
